resources:
Physics Data Review Formulas Explanation
//topic 1 ∆y = absolute uncertainty of y
∆a = absolute uncertainty of a
∆b = absolute uncertainty of b

Formulas for uncertainty calculation. A = vector
AH = horizontal component of vector
Av = vertical component of vector

Be aware of where the reference angle is and apply the suitable trigonometric identities. //topic 2 v = final velocity
u = initial velocity
a = acceleration
t = time elapsed
s = displacement

“Suvat” equations for uniform motion. Acceleration must be constant.
